title: Instructional Design Strategies for Utilizing Remote and Virtual Laboratory Recommendation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Science Education Experience and Basic ICT Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Need to establish effective RVL utilization strategies in a smartphone-based limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners understand and explain the operational principles of an RVL recommendation system based on learning design.
Learners develop RVL evaluation criteria incorporating teacher ICT competency profiles and learning design elements.
Learners design smartphone-based RVL utilization strategies for limited-technology environments.
The evaluation results of the recommendation system can be analyzed and applied to RVL selection decisions

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
